title: Deezer Music Player: Songs, Playlists & Podcasts
description: Just press play. With 73 million tracks, playlists and podcasts plus personalized recommendations just for you, Deezer is your free music companion. Listen to the songs and podcasts you love and discover your new favorites with the music player. Your life deserves its own soundtrack. Enjoy the best features with the free Deezer music app ‚Ä¢ Browse 73 million songs for free ‚Ä¢ Identify tracks with SongCatcher ‚Ä¢ Find new tracks with Shuffle mode ‚Ä¢ Sing along with Lyrics ‚Ä¢ Play by genre and moods ‚Ä¢ Get personalized recommendations with Flow ‚Ä¢ Add songs to your Favorites collection ‚Ä¢ Discover and create your own playlists ‚Ä¢ Make collaborative playlists ‚Ä¢ Choose a time to stop your music with the sleep timer function ‚Ä¢ Share your favorite songs or podcasts on social media ‚Ä¢ Listen to radio stations plus audio channels, and podcasts Want more? Go limitless with Deezer Premium, Deezer Family, Deezer Student & Deezer HiFi and enjoy an ad-free, offline listening music player ‚Ä¢ No ads ‚Ä¢ Offline Mode: download and listen, no wifi needed ‚Ä¢ Unlimited skips ‚Ä¢ Find favorite artists ‚Ä¢ Superior Sound Quality (320 kBps) Compatible devices Enjoy Deezer on all your connected devices - listen on Google Nest, Amazon Alexa, Sonos and more. Deezer Family: Get up to 6 Deezer Premium accounts on the family plan, to share the love of music with the whole family. Deezer Student: All the benefits of Deezer Premium like no ads, downloads and offline music, for half the price. Deezer HiFi: Stream lossless quality music in high fidelity sound on high-res sound systems. Privacy policy: http://www.deezer.com/legal/personal-datas.php Terms of use: http://www.deezer.com/legal/cgu.php The Deezer music player offers unlimited access to songs and podcasts. Discover and create playlists to give your life the perfect soundtrack. No wifi needed - download songs and enjoy offline music - perfect for when you‚Äôre at home or on the go. Discover more of what you love, including inspiring podcasts and the freshest tracks.
descriptionHTML:
Just press play. With 73 million tracks, playlists and podcasts plus personalized recommendations just for you, Deezer is your free music companion. Listen to the songs and podcasts you love and discover your new favorites with the music player. Your life deserves its own soundtrack.

Enjoy the best features with the free Deezer music app

‚Ä¢ Browse 73 million songs for free
‚Ä¢ Identify tracks with SongCatcher
‚Ä¢ Find new tracks with Shuffle mode
‚Ä¢ Sing along with Lyrics
‚Ä¢ Play by genre and moods
‚Ä¢ Get personalized recommendations with Flow
‚Ä¢ Add songs to your Favorites collection
‚Ä¢ Discover and create your own playlists
‚Ä¢ Make collaborative playlists
‚Ä¢ Choose a time to stop your music with the sleep timer function
‚Ä¢ Share your favorite songs or podcasts on social media
‚Ä¢ Listen to radio stations plus audio channels, and podcasts

Want more? Go limitless with Deezer Premium, Deezer Family, Deezer Student & Deezer HiFi and enjoy an ad-free, offline listening music player

‚Ä¢ No ads
‚Ä¢ Offline Mode: download and listen, no wifi needed
‚Ä¢ Unlimited skips
‚Ä¢ Find favorite artists
‚Ä¢ Superior Sound Quality (320 kBps)

Compatible devices

Enjoy Deezer on all your connected devices - listen on Google Nest, Amazon Alexa, Sonos and more.

Deezer Family:
Get up to 6 Deezer Premium accounts on the family plan, to share the love of music with the whole family.

Deezer Student:
All the benefits of Deezer Premium like no ads, downloads and offline music, for half the price.

Deezer HiFi:
Stream lossless quality music in high fidelity sound on high-res sound systems.

Privacy policy: http://www.deezer.com/legal/personal-datas.php
Terms of use: http://www.deezer.com/legal/cgu.php

The Deezer music player offers unlimited access to songs and podcasts. Discover and create playlists to give your life the perfect soundtrack. No wifi needed - download songs and enjoy offline music - perfect for when you‚Äôre at home or on the go. Discover more of what you love, including inspiring podcasts and the freshest tracks.
